Subroutine initialseed

322 : 
323 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
324 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
325 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
326 : 
327 :       subroutine initialseed ()
328 :       use sce_mod
329 :       implicit none
330 : 
331 :       INTEGER :: i_, j_, k_, worstcount                             ! worstcount for counting number of negative objective functions
332 :       INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: posarray(:,:)
333 :       REAL*8,  ALLOCATABLE :: initpop(:,:)
334 : 
335 :       allocate(posarray(2**nopt,nopt))
336 :       allocate(initpop(nopt,5))
337 : 
338 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
339 : ! PRINT DIMENSION INFORMATION
340 : 
341 :       write(*,'("  Number of model parameters:",10x,i3)') npar
342 :       write(*,'("  Number of optimisable parameters:",i7)') nopt
343 :       write(*,'("  Maximum number of complexes:",9x,i3)') ncomp
344 :       write(*,'("  Minimum number of runs per complex:",i5,//)') mopt
345 :       write(kfile_progress,'("  Number of model parameters:",10x,i3)') npar
346 :       write(kfile_progress,'("  Number of optimisable parameters:",i7)') nopt
347 :       write(kfile_progress,'("  Maximum number of complexes:",9x,i3)') ncomp
348 :       write(kfile_progress,'("  Minimum number of runs per complex:",i5,//)') mopt
349 : 
350 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
351 : ! CALCULATING OF USING INITAL GUESS IN SHUFFLE.PAR
352 : 
353 :       nsincebest = 0
354 :       evolution = 'seed'
355 :       ofvec(:) = -9999.9d0
356 :       shufflevar(:,1) = parval(:)
357 :       nrun = 0
358 :     worstcount = 0
359 :       call runmodel(shufflevar(:,1), ofvec(1))
360 :       
361 :     if (ofvec(1) .le. 0) then
362 :       worstcount = worstcount + 1
363 :     endif
364 :     
365 :     bestobj = ofvec(1)
366 :       bestincomp = bestobj
367 :       open(kfile_currentbest, file=sfile_currentbest(1:len_trim(sfile_currentbest)))
368 :       write(kfile_currentbest,outformat) shufflevar(:,1), bestobj
369 :       close(kfile_currentbest)
370 :       write(*,'("Systematic seed of",i4," parameters for ",i2," complexes. Initial OF= ",e12.6)') &
371 :       & nopt, ncomp, ofvec(1)
372 : 
373 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
374 : ! GENERATE A SYSTEMATIC ARRAY OF INITIAL PARAMETER VALUES FOLLOWING
375 : ! Muttil & Liong (2004, Journal of Hydraulic Engineering-Asce 130(12):1202-1205
376 : ! (INSERTED BY STAN)
377 : !        
378 : ! NONAXIAL POINTS:
379 : 
380 :       posarray(1,1) = 1
381 :       posarray(2,1) = 2
382 :       do j_ = 1, nopt
383 :         k_ = optid(j_)
384 :         initpop(j_,1) = 0.125d0 * parmax(k_) + 0.875d0 * parmin(k_)  ! each position j contains the intial perturbation of an optimised parameter
385 :         initpop(j_,2) = 0.125d0 * parmin(k_) + 0.875d0 * parmax(k_)
386 :         initpop(j_,3) = 0.5d0 * (parmin(k_) + parmax(k_))
387 :         initpop(j_,4) = 0.25d0 * parmax(k_) + 0.75d0 * parmin(k_)
388 :         initpop(j_,5) = 0.25d0 * parmin(k_) + 0.75d0 * parmax(k_)
389 :         posarray(2**(j_-1)+1:2**j_, 1:j_-1) = posarray(1:2**(j_-1), 1:j_-1)
390 :         posarray(1:2**(j_-1), j_) = 1
391 :         posarray(2**(j_-1)+1:2**j_, j_) = 2
392 :       enddo
393 : 
394 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
395 : ! THIS BLOCK CAN BE PARALLELISED!
396 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
397 : 
398 :       do i_ = 2,sopt
399 :         shufflevar(:,i_) = parval(:)              ! TO SET NON-OPTIMISING PARAMETERS
400 :         if (i_ .le. 4) then
401 :           do j_ = 1, nopt
402 :             k_ = optid(j_)
403 :             shufflevar(k_,i_) = initpop(j_,i_+1)
404 :           enddo
405 :           call runmodel(shufflevar(:,i_), ofvec(i_))
406 :       
407 :       if (ofvec(i_) .le. 0) then
408 :           worstcount = worstcount + 1
409 :         endif
410 :       
411 :         elseif (i_ .le. Size(posarray(:,:),1)) then
412 :           do j_ = 1, nopt
413 :             k_ = optid(j_)
414 :             shufflevar(k_,i_) = initpop(j_, posarray(i_-4, j_))
415 :           enddo
416 :           call runmodel(shufflevar(:,i_), ofvec(i_))
417 :       
418 :       if (ofvec(i_) .le. 0) then
419 :           worstcount = worstcount + 1
420 :         endif
421 :       
422 :         else
423 : 
424 : !         * IF MORE POINTS ARE NEEDED, GENERATE RANDOM POINTS
425 : 
426 :           evolution = 'mutation'
427 :           do while (ofvec(i_) .le. 0.d0)          ! first loop must generate feasible values to start with
428 :             call random_number(ranarr(:))         ! RANDOM ARRAY OF SIZE 1:nopt
429 :             do j_ = 1, nopt
430 :               k_ = optid(j_)
431 : 
432 : !             * STAN'S MODIFICATION TO GET COMPLETELY RANDOM SEED:
433 : 
434 :               shufflevar(k_,i_) = parmin(k_) + focus * (parmax(k_) - parmin(k_)) * ranarr(j_)
435 :             enddo
436 :             shufflevar(optid(:),i_) = merge(shufflevar(optid(:),i_), parmin(optid(:)),      &
437 :      &                             shufflevar(optid(:),i_) .gt. parmin(optid(:)))
438 :             shufflevar(optid(:),i_) = merge(shufflevar(optid(:),i_), parmax(optid(:)),      &
439 :      &                             shufflevar(optid(:),i_) .lt. parmax(optid(:)))
440 :             call runmodel(shufflevar(:,i_), ofvec(i_))
441 :       
442 :       if (ofvec(i_) .le. 0) then
443 :             worstcount = worstcount + 1
444 :           endif
445 :       
446 :       if (nrun .gt. 100 .and. nrun .eq. worstcount) then       ! program stops after 100 runs without positive objective function
447 :         success = 2
448 :         call writepars()
449 :         exit
450 :         endif
451 :             
452 :           enddo
453 :         endif
454 :         if (ofvec(i_) .gt. bestobj) then
455 :           bestobj = ofvec(i_)
456 :           open(kfile_currentbest, file=sfile_currentbest(1:len_trim(sfile_currentbest)))
457 :           write(kfile_currentbest,outformat) shufflevar(:,i_), bestobj
458 :           close(kfile_currentbest)
459 :         endif
460 :     
461 :     if (success .eq. 2) exit
462 :     
463 :       enddo
464 :       nloop = -1                                  ! FIRST LOOP IS LOOP ZERO
465 :       call writeloop
466 : 
467 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
468 : ! END OF BLOCK THAT CAN BE PARALLELISED!
469 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
470 : 
471 :       deallocate(posarray)
472 :       deallocate(initpop)
473 : 
474 :       return
475 :       end subroutine initialseed
